Message.Name: low-health
Message.Text: ${name} cannot fight to${shift}, because she is not healthy enough for such a dangerous job.

Message.Name: is-pregnant
Message.Text: ${name} cannot fight to${shift}, because she is pregnant.

Message.Name: girl-survives.healing
Message.Text: She is immediately brought to the surgery room in the Arena's catacombs, and your Medics start treating her wounds. She will need weeks to recover, but the quick medical intervention prevented more serious complications.

Message.Name: girl-survives.no-healing
Message.Text: She is immediately brought to the surgery room in the Arena's catacombs, but no Medic is available to treat her wounds.
